lolā： lolā（thī）
လောလာ（ထီ）
«lola+ā»
[လောလ+အာ]

Lolā：A Paribbājikā，sister of Saccaka．（J．iii．1）

See also the Cullakālinga Jātaka．After the discussion which she and her sisters had with Sāriputta，in which they were defeated，she joined the Order with the others and became an arahant．MA．i．450f．

lolā：လောလာ（ထီ）
[လောလ+အာ]
လောလာမည်သော-သတို့သမီး-ပရိဗိုဇ်မ။
